Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qoppa.pdf.Layer

  • public abstract class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a PDF 'Layer'.
    Author:
    Qoppa Software

      • getName

        public abstract java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this layer.
        Returns:
        The name of the layer.

      • setName

        public abstract void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of this layer.

      • isVisible

        public abstract boolean isVisible()
        Returns whether this layer is currently visible.
        Returns:
        Layer's visibility.

      • setVisible

        public abstract void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Sets the visibility for this layer.
        Parameters:
        visible - The new visibility.

      • getDefaultState

        public abstract int getDefaultState()
        Returns the default state for this layer. One of Layer.STATE_OFF or Layer.STATE_ON.
        Returns:
        Layer's initial visibility.

      • setDefaultState

        public abstract void setDefaultState(int state)
        Sets the default state for this layer. Should be one of Layer.STATE_OFF or Layer.STATE_ON.
        Parameters:
        state - The new initial visibility.

      • isLocked

        public abstract boolean isLocked()
        Returns whether this layer is locked.
        Returns:
        Layer's locked state.

      • setLocked

        public abstract void setLocked(boolean locked)
        Sets the locked state of the layer.
        Parameters:
        locked - The new locked state.

      • addLayerListener

        public abstract void addLayerListener(LayerListener l)
        Adds an object that will listen to changes in the layer's visible state. All listeners will be notified when a layer is made visible or invisible.
        Parameters:
        l - The new layer listener.

      • removeLayerListener

        public abstract void removeLayerListener(LayerListener l)
        Removes a layer listener from the list of active listeners.
        Parameters:
        l - The listener to remove.
